author: SciShow
description:
Check out The Inner Clock by Lynne Peeples at https://bookshop.org/lists/scishow-recommended-reading. This video was made possible by the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation. To learn more, head to https://sloan.org/programs/public-understanding.

The idea of improving athletic performance with a certain kind of lighting sounds absurd, but some NFL and MLB teams are trying it. The question is: does it work?

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: NFL Teams Are Trying to Win More Games with Lights
